hero.headline: After 50 years healing others, Dr. José needs our help
hero.subheadline: 74-year-old urologist needs specialized treatment after stroke

story.title: José's Story
story.content:
Dr. José Gomes de Oliveira dedicated his life to medicine. With advanced training in Germany and the USA, he brought world-class urological care to Brazil. Father of 5, grandfather, beloved physician to thousands.

In recent weeks, Dr. José suffered a stroke requiring specialized treatment and intensive care. His family is united to provide the best possible care.

Every contribution, large or small, makes a difference in his recovery journey.
